Events > July 19, 2016

#214 Lightning Talks! Part Deux


Update! See the videos of these talks in our recap blog post July 19 lightning talks: empathy, inclusion and progress.

Based on the success of the lightning talks we did for our 200th episode, we’re giving it another go!

We will hear from 9 members of Chi Hack Night about what they’ve done at or learned from our group. Each presenter gets 2 minutes!

The presenters are:

  1. March 22nd, 2012
    Derek Eder

  2. Mapping in Europe
    Steven Vance

  3. Why ignorance matters at hacknight
    Eureka Foong

  4. Predicting E. Coli Exceedances on Chicago Beaches
    Rebecca Jones

  5. Hacking for inclusion
    Cathy Deng

  6. Access to Justice Update
    Emily Zvolanek

  7. My Building Doesn't Recycle: The Final Frontier?
    Claire Micklin

  8. Learning to Listen
    Benjamin Cooper

  9. Hackers and the Mob
    Nick Mader

Prepare to be zapped with civic tech knowledge and wisdom!
